recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Grilled chicken chunks in a creamy and spicy tomato-based sauce, perfect with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
recipes.description: A healthy bowl filled with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a tangy dressing.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Burger
recipes.description: Juicy beef patty on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips, a perfect sweet treat.
